## Extension.type property

This defines the type of the extension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly type: ExtensionType;
```

## Remarks

There are three types of extension:

- `plain` - `node` - see [NodeExtension](./core.nodeextension.md) - `mark` - see [MarkExtension](./core.markextension.md)

This identifier is used in the extension manager to separate marks from nodes and to determine the functionality of each extension.
